comments:
I performed a Replacew with Version on a project that had incoming changes in the sync view. I expected the changes to be cleared bu they were not. I then tried a synchronize and got this exception:

org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSException: Resource src/zxfs is not a child of folder MyJavaProject2-copy
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolder.getChild(RemoteFolder.java:344)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CacheTreeContentsOperation.getCVSArguments(CacheTreeContentsOperation.java:134)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.SingleCommandOperation.execute(SingleCommandOperation.java:42)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CacheTreeContentsOperation.execute(CacheTreeContentsOperation.java:55)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.RepositoryProviderOperation.execute(RepositoryProviderOperation.java:280)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.SingleCommandOperation.execute(SingleCommandOperation.java:66)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.RepositoryProviderOperation.execute(RepositoryProviderOperation.java:256)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.RepositoryProviderOperation.execute(RepositoryProviderOperation.java:210)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CVSOperation.run(CVSOperation.java:81)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.mappings.WorkspaceSubscriberContext.cacheContents(WorkspaceSubscriberContext.java:306)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.mappings.WorkspaceSubscriberContext$3.run(WorkspaceSubscriberContext.java:274)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.subscribers.SubscriberEventHandler$RunnableEvent.run(SubscriberEventHandler.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.subscribers.SubscriberEventHandler.executeRunnable(SubscriberEventHandler.java:390)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.subscribers.SubscriberEventHandler.processEvent(SubscriberEventHandler.java:330)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler.processEvents(BackgroundEventHandler.java:329)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler$1.run(BackgroundEventHandler.java:173)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
It was incoming additions that were not cleared

traces.message: Resource src/zxfs is not a child of folder MyJavaProject2-copy
